questions.question: The polynomial regression models can be used when, the relation between response and explainatory variables is:

answers.a: 3<sup>rd</sup> order polynomial regression model in x
answers.b: first order polynomial regression model in x
answers.c: 2<sup>nd</sup> order polynomial regression model in x

answers.a: the coefficient β<sub>1</sub> is the quadratic effect parameter
answers.b: the coefficient β<sub>2</sub> is the linear effect parameter
answers.c: the coefficient β<sub>2</sub> is the quadratic effect parameter
answers.d: the coefficient β<sub>0</sub> is the quadratic effect parameter
